text:
Hamcrest is needed by junit see https://github.com/junit-team/junit/wiki/Download-and-Install

Without you may have some tests that fail with :
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/hamcrest/SelfDescribing

Needed if you want to write tests that do not extends TestCase (pojo that only use annotation)
